presentation.title: Mobile apps with ClojureScript and React Native
presentation.description: ClojureScript on React Native is making headway as a valid platform for developing mobile apps. It combines the power of React Native with functional programming, immutable data structures, and live reloading. In this talk, Eric will live code an app from scratch to show off the development features of ClojureScript.

presentation.title: Angular 2. The Good, the Bad, and the Meh
presentation.description: The wait for Angular 2 is finally over. Cameron will talk about his experience building a small application using the framework - what's to like, what's not to like.

presentation.title: Sketch. A modern tool for modern times
presentation.description: As Photoshop was initially created for photo editing, Sketch was created for designing digital products. In its short lifespan, it has already become an industry darling for top design agencies and User Experience Designers. Steven will go over basics, some nifty plugins, and take a look at the beta version of the powerful Craft plugin from inVision.
